channel.title: NPC drops
channel.description:
I've been adding drops to the NPCDrops.TSM with "NPC-ID":"RARETY" and than a list of items. When I compile I get no errors at all, when I run the server I get no errors at all. When I do this with the NpcConstants.TMS [b]everything[/b] works fine! [b]BUT[/b] the normal drops in the NPCDrops.TSM just don't show at all! I've edited the drops at Bandos and Armadyl and that works perfectly.
I'm using a PI basis anyone has an idea what I might be doing wrong?

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

sorry i ment .cfg you have to have a .cfg of npcdrops or it might be named something else involving the word drops or npc’s. But this is what i mean by spacing is right

npcdrop = 1 1 6529 3 6529 4 6529 5 6529 6 6529 7 6529 8 6529 9 6529 10 6529 11 6529 12 6529 13 6529 14 6529 15

Notice the spacing is right because if you mess up you will get error’s, Remember to have the right npc though if you copy that code.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

Thanks for the idea, however I don’t think I’m supposed to be in the .java but I am going to try it :D. What did you mean by the right amoumt of spaces? I’m just supposed to use the “tab” key right?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

try npcdrops.java? im not too familiar with pi so dont blame me if im wrong and check your codes to make sure you have the right ammount of spaces in between each. Also make sure you have the right i’ds and npc id’s i cant really help that much because i dont use pi but thats all i can say x) goodluck

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

I’ve been adding drops to the NPCDrops.TSM with “NPC-ID”:“RARETY” and than a list of items. When I compile I get no errors at all, when I run the server I get no errors at all. When I do this with the NpcConstants.TMS everything works fine! BUT the normal drops in the NPCDrops.TSM just don’t show at all! I’ve edited the drops at Bandos and Armadyl and that works perfectly.

I’m using a PI basis anyone has an idea what I might be doing wrong?
